title: Granddad's Christmas
description: Granddad spends Christmas by himself.But he's not really alone.Granddad has a lifetime of memories of Christmas past, near and far, which come to mind at this special time.A touching tale to remind us that memories of the special season can stay with us forever.Celebrate Granddad's Christmas.From the author of My Superhero Family and The Grumpy Potatoes.
author: Fitri Silman
